name: io.github.Tyox-all/mund
description: AI security scanner - secrets, PII, prompt injection, and exfiltration detection.

environmentVariables.name: MUND_SEVERITY_THRESHOLD
environmentVariables.description: Minimum severity level to report (low, medium, high, critical)

tools.name: mund_scan_content
tools.description: Full security scan on content for secrets, PII, injection, and exfiltration

tools.name: mund_scan_secrets
tools.description: Scan for API keys, tokens, passwords, and credentials (30+ patterns)

tools.name: mund_scan_pii
tools.description: Detect personally identifiable information (SSN, credit cards, email, phone)

tools.name: mund_scan_injection
tools.description: Detect prompt injection and jailbreak attempts

tools.name: mund_scan_exfiltration
tools.description: Detect data exfiltration patterns and encoding tricks

tools.name: mund_analyze_code
tools.description: Analyze code for security vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, eval)

tools.name: mund_get_rules
tools.description: Get current detection rules and patterns
